#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main() {
	int T;
	scanf("%d",&T);
	while(T-->0) {
		string a,b;
		cin>>a>>b;
		int lenA = a.length(),lenB = b.length(), diff = lenA-lenB,count=0;
		if(diff<0) 
		for(int i=0;i<abs(diff);i++)
		a = '0' + a;
		else for(int i=0;i<diff;i++)
		b = '0' + b;
		for(int i=max(lenA-1,lenB-1);i>=0;i--) 
		if(a[i]-'0'+b[i]-'0'>9) {
			count++;
			if(i!=0)
			{
			a[i-1] = a[i-1] - '0';
			a[i-1]++;
			a[i-1] = a[i-1] +'0';
			}
		}
		printf("%d\n",count);
	}	return 0;
}
